name: Going Up
description:
Going Up is a fast-paced science-fiction sword fighting game. Fight endless waves of enemies in a totally doomed quest to reach the end (and a less doomed quest to reach the high score board).


Features:
  • Endless waves
  • Multiple kinds of evil robots
  • Wield a bolt of lightning! In VR!
  • Boss battle
  • Probably not going to shoot your dog (but it is Early Access)


Planned features:
  • Cosmetic unlocks
  • More enemy types
  • More boss battles
